summary: Implements a Socket class that encapsulates the low‑level TCP communication with an EPP server, handling connection establishment, login authentication, message transmission, response parsing, and automatic reconnection with back‑off on failures.
business_intent: Provide a reliable, reusable network layer for applications that need to interact with an Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) service, abstracting socket management and error handling so domain‑registry operations can be performed without dealing with raw socket code.
